artist: Artist: Riina Kuikka; Manufacturer: Vallila Interior
creditline: Gift of Vallila Interior, Helsinki - Finland
description: collage-like images of city--buildings, manhole covers, squirrels, neon sign, cobblestone roads, leaf, silhouettes of bicycles, ship, Ferris wheel, light pole; printed in shades of green and black on white
markings: attached to long side with plastic: manufacturer\'s paper tag
signed: along one long side, printed (repeating) in black: [VALLILA   \"Helsinki\"  Riina Kuikka  2011]
title: Helsinki
